column4: could someone please help me i am having a problem with my wireless card since upgrading to 11.04
if you run:  sudo iwlist scan     do you see wireless APs?
if you run:  sudo rfkill list     is the wireless blocked in any way?
can you give the output of:  sudo lshw -C network; lsb_release -a     use a pastebin. Thanks
if you unload then load the module, does the device jump into life?
how do you load and unload?
sudo modprobe -r rtl8180; sleep 3; sudo modprobe rtl8180
do i put sleep3 in the command or you mdan wait 3 secs
yeah, just lets the system chill a little
ok, run:  dmesg | tail    what is output?
